news.title: We are on vacation!
news.content: From 17.08.2023 to 21.08.2023 we are closed. From 22.08.2023 we are back for you. We wish you a nice time and look forward to your visit!

about.title: About us
about.content:
Our small and cozy family restaurant is located in beautiful Vaihingen. Our kitchen combines authentic Japanese cuisine and traditional Vietnamese specialties. With more than 15 years of experience we offer you a spectacular experience in a very individual way. 

In addition to traditional dishes, you can expect original new compositions, all prepared with fresh and quality ingredients.

Sounds tempting? Come by and linger a while with one of our homemade drinks or a cold Japanese beer.

booking.title: Book a table
booking.date: Choose the date you want to visit us:
booking.time: Choose the time for which you want to book:

personCount.subtitle: For how many people do you want to reserve? Keep in mind that we can only accept reservations for up to 4 people. For larger groups, please call us or send us an email.

fillInformation.subtitle: Almost done! Please fill in a few more contact information:

booking.reservationSaved: Thank you for your reservation. We have sent you a confirmation email. Otherwise, the reservation will be automatically canceled within 24 hours.
booking.reservationError: Unfortunately something went wrong with the reservation, please try again or call us!

body.suggestionsError: Unfortunately we are not able to provide you with any suggestions at the moment. Please try again later.
body.availableTimes: Unfortunately, the time you specified is no longer available. We have suggestions for you here:
body.noSuggestions: Unfortunately we are already fully booked for this date, please try another date.

accept.title: Booking confirmed
accept.body: Your booking is confirmed. We are looking forward to seeing you!

failed.title: Booking failed
failed.body: Unfortunately, something went wrong with your booking. Call us. We are happy to help you!

alreadyConfirmed.title: Booking already confirmed
alreadyConfirmed.body: Your booking is already confirmed. We are looking forward to seeing you!

booking.experimental: Note: This feature is still experimental.If you have any issues regarding your reservation, please send a message to bueffelundkoi@gmail.com
